metadata.title: CVE-2022-48737 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ASoC:ops: Reject out of bounds values in snd_soc_put_volsw_sx() We don'tcurrently validate that the values being set are within the range weadvertised to userspace as being valid, do so and reject any values thatare out of range.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
